column5: Managed a few after work yesterday. Seems light pink worms are also on the steelies menue. Cheers.

I bought PINK for this upcoming Sunday. Im going on the word of you new wave river guys. Still tho,I,ll have a few traditional roe bags and worms and some boiled sinfles,just incase.  Nice fish. 2nd looks like it,s spawned out.
my droppies in the last 2 days have all been on berkley steelhead worms and small pink plastic jigs.
This opener all my steelhead have been on pink worms with an exception of one that hit roe.
What's the actually length of the worms?  Also, what's the best rig for them?

The Riverworms that I use come in 2 and 3 inch lengths. You can rig them wacky style however I like to use them on Jig heads. On occassion I also use the old needle technique and thread the line down the worm. Hope this helps. Cheers
Beauty silverstreak    Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
What's a good jig head weight to use?
